text: The 1981 Algerian Super Cup is the 1st edition of Algerian Super Cup, a football match contested by the winners of the Championnat National and 1980–81 Algerian Cup competitions. The match was scheduled to be played on 20 August 1981 at 20 August 1955 Stadium in Algiers between 1980-81 Championnat National winners RC Kouba and 1980–81 Algerian Cup winners USM Alger. == Match details == {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK|| ? || Lyes Teldja |- ||| ? || Redouane Drici |- ||| ? || Rachid Bouzama |- ||| ? || Sebki |- ||| ? || Salmi |- ||| ? || Hocine Boumaraf |- ||| ? || Youcef Kaboul |- ||| ? || Abdelaziz Safsafi |- ||| ? || Louaib |- ||| ? || Rachid Hamada |- ||| ? || Khaouni || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- ||| ? || kedibel || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Abdelkader Zerrar |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK|| ? || Kesraoui |- |DF|| ? || Mohamed Soumatia |- |DF|| ? || Abdelmalek Ali Messaoud |- |DF|| ? || Réda Abdouche || || |- |DF|| ? || Djamel Keddou (c) |- |DF|| ? || Ali Slimani |- |MF|| ? || Ali Rabah Talbi |- |FW|| ? || Omar Betrouni |- |MF|| ? || Hocine Rabet |- |MF|| ? || Salim Boutamine |- |FW|| ? || Bedjaoui || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |DF|| ? || Nacer Daoud || || |- |FW|| ? || Mohamed Benmohamed || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Ali Benfadah |} |} == References == 1981 Supercup Category:USM Alger matches Category:RC Kouba
